
<div style="float:left;"><div style="float:right;">[[/Image:Scripting.jpg.md|Image:Scripting.jpg]]</div>Hello, and welcome to the wiki page of the DexieFramework for mta. This project was known under the name of MTA Framework.

But since that i changed the whole structure of the framework, i decided to give it an other name. This name is not really pretty, but it is a name i work with.

This framework need to make programming in mta a lot easier. We will explain what the difference between the native functions and our functions are on the pages where the function are documented. 

--[[/User:Mrdejong.md|Mrdejong]] 20:25, 11 July 2009 (CEST)
